column2: "Adze biara wɔ ne hyɛber
"awoo n’aber
column3: na owu n’aber; aber a wɔtsɛw
column4: na aber a wotu dza wɔatsɛw no;"

column2: "aber a woku
column3: na aber a wɔsa yarba; aber a wobubu gu famu
column4: na aber a wɔma do si;"

column2: "aber a wosu
column3: na aber a wɔserew; aber a wogyam

column2: "aber a wɔtotow abo gu
column3: na aber a wɔboaboa ano; aber a wɔyɛ etuu
column4: na aber a wogyaa etuuyɛ mu;"

column2: "aber a wɔhwehwɛ adze
column3: na aber a wɔyew adze; aber a wosie adze
column4: na aber a wɔtow adze kyen;"

column2: "aber a wosunsuan mu
column3: na aber a wɔpempam; aber a wɔyɛ komm

column2: "aber a wɔdɔ
column3: na aber a wɔtan; ɔsa n’aber

column2: "Mfaso bɛn na nyia ɔyɛ edwuma nya no wɔ dza ɔberɛ ho no mu?"
"Mehu ɔberɛ edwuma a Nyankopɔn dze ama adasamba dɛ wɔmfa mu."
"Ɔayɛ adze nyina fɛɛfɛw wɔ ne ber mu: eso ɔdze mber ahorow ho adwen ahyɛ hɔn akoma mu
column3: naaso nyimpa nntum nnhu edwuma a Nyankopɔn ayɛ mu
column4: ofitsi ahyɛse araa dze kodu ewiei mpo."

column2: "Minyim dɛ biribi papa biara nnyi hɔ ma adasamba
column4: na wɔayɛ dza oye aber a wɔdze tse ase nyina."

column2: "Na eso dɛ nyimpa biara bedzidzi na ɔanom
column3: na oenya ne ber nyinara mu ndzepa oedzi no

column2: "Minyim dɛ biribiara a Nyankopɔn yɛ no
column3: ɔnoara na ɔbɛtsena hɔ daa: wɔnnkɛfa hweeara aka ho

column2: "Dza ɔwɔ hɔ yi
column3: ɔwɔ hɔ dadaada ana; na dza ɔbɛba no
column4: oenya aba dadaada ana: na Nyankopɔn hwehwɛ dza etwa mu asen no bio."

column2: "Na nkyii so muhun wɔ wi ase
column4: dɛ emumuyɛ wɔ hɔ; na ndzeyɛtsenenee bea do

column2: "Mekae wɔ m’akoma mu dɛ
column3: Nyankopɔn bobu atseneneefo na emumuyɛfo nyina atsɛn
column4: osiandɛ ɔahyɛ da bi ama tsirmpɔw na ndzeyɛɛ biara."

column2: "Mekae wɔ m’akoma mu faa adasamba ho dɛ
column4: na ama woeehu dɛ hɔnankasa wɔtse dɛ mbowa ara."

column2: "Na dza ɔba adasamba do no ara na ɔba mbowa do; adze kor pɛr ara na ɔba hɔn do: mbrɛ ɔbaako wu no
column3: mbrɛ ɔbaako so wu ara nye no; nyew
column4: ahom kor na hɔn nyinara wɔwɔ; na nyimpa nnyi biribiara a ɔdze kyɛn mbowa: na ne nyinara so mpo

column2: "Hɔn nyinara wɔkɔ bea kor do; hɔn nyinara wofi huntuma mu
column3: na hɔn nyinara wɔsan kɔ huntuma mu bio."

column2: "Woana nyim ɔdasanyi no sunsum dɛ ɔfow kɔ sor na abowa sunsum dɛ osian kɔ asaase do famu?"
"Dɛm ntsi muhun dɛ adze papa biara nnyi hɔ
column3: sen dɛ dasanyi bedzi n’edwuma mu ehurusi; osiandɛ ne kyɛpɛn ara nye no: na woana dze no bɛsan aba ma oebohu dza obesi wɔ n’ekyir?"
